The sketch consists of a single face with a loop_1, composed of six lines. Extrusion 1. Scale the sketch by a factor of 0.75. 2. Extrude the scaled sketch to a depth of 0.15, towards the normal. Part 2: Construction of a Cylindrical Cutout Construct a cylindrical cutout in the rectangular prism. 1.
